metadata.title: CVE-2020-27827 lldp/openvswitch: denial of service via externally triggered memory leak (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in multiple versions of Open vSwitch. Specially crafted LLDP packets can cause memory to be lost when allocating data to handle specific optional TLVs, potentially causing a denial of service. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.
            STATEMENT: Red Hat OpenStack Platform 13's openvswitch package will receive it's fixes from Fast Datapath.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
openvswitch2.13 is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
